org.jhove2.module.format.sgml
Class SgmlNormFileParser

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.format.sgml.SgmlNormFileParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
SgmlNormParser
public class SgmlNormFileParser
extends Object
implements SgmlNormParser

Class for parsing output of OpenSp sgmlnorm utility. This utility is run in order to extract the DOCTYPE statement and any public or system identifer from an SGML document. Please see the SGML module specification for details about running this utility.

Author:
smorrissey

protected  void extractDocProperties(SgmlDocumentProperties props)
          Extract significant properties obtained from parsed file and add to SgmlDocumentProperties object associated with the file
protected  int lookForPubid(String tempMessage)
          Parse String containing DOCTYPE statement to see if there is a public identifier If pubid is found, update foundPubId to "true", and extract and store pubid in field "pubid"
protected  void lookForSystemId(String restOfMessage)
          Parse String containing DOCTYPE statement to see if it contains System Identifier If found, set this.foundSysid to true, and set this.systemId to value of System Identifier

Parses the output file generated by the OpenSP sgmlnorm utility

extractDocProperties

protected void extractDocProperties(SgmlDocumentProperties props)
Extract significant properties obtained from parsed file and add to SgmlDocumentProperties object associated with the file

Parameters:
props -

lookForPubid

protected int lookForPubid(String tempMessage)
Parse String containing DOCTYPE statement to see if there is a public identifier If pubid is found, update foundPubId to "true", and extract and store pubid in field "pubid"

Parameters:
tempMessage - String containing DOCTYPE statement
Returns:
position of terminal single or double quote of the public identifier, or -1 if no public identifier found

lookForSystemId

protected void lookForSystemId(String restOfMessage)
Parse String containing DOCTYPE statement to see if it contains System Identifier If found, set this.foundSysid to true, and set this.systemId to value of System Identifier

Parameters:
restOfMessage - String containing DOCTYPE statement
